column3: “In the challenge of great purple primates, Grape Ape is the alpha, with Purple Gorilla runner-up. Not as dense but just as sticky. Tastes of earth and citrus, very   diesel / skunk / chem / pungent, no noticeable grape flavor. Good anytime medication for pain, happiness and relaxation.”
“This shit sat me down after three hits. It's some of the best weed I've had in recent memory. I mean I couldn't walk for half an hour... ✌️”

“This is the very dank. Dark purple and musky/earthy. The first time I enjoyed it, I took giant puffs and it snuck up on me. I was in a twilight state for hours. I felt no pain (I had been in terrible pain before smoking) and I could feel the smile lift my face a little more every so often. This strain is so dreamy I would take it to the home coming dance. 

I read somewhere that if you can, you should space your slee...”
“very fruity berry flavor in the volcano. Definitely a killer purple strain with lots of funky flavor and dark hues!”
“This shit strong.. Fire weed good taste great High will make you cough”
“omg..this is so smooth..it is really the purple version of a good gorilla glue...giving you purple chill and high of the gorilla”
“This that grade A budd, smells and taste great. Finally got my connect to get this and then copped a half oz of it just had too.”

“Beautiful purple buds with an earthy but sweet  aroma. The burn is okay and the high is mellow , relaxing and makes you not too Tired. Considering it's mostly indica. But overall a great strain and beautiful buds you just don't want to break.”

“Beautiful purple buds with an earthy but sweet  aroma. The burn is okay and the high is mellow , relaxing and makes you not too Tired. Considering it's mostly indica. But overall a great strain and beautiful buds you just don't want to break.”
“This strain has helped me through severe back pain and anxiety. I recommend this for its smooth smoke and body high.”
“Very purple and lots of crystals. Smelled like grape soda and tasted like a sweet purple cady.”

“Hybrid, but more sativa i'd say; 30/70. interesting sativa dominant pheno from Revolution.  Nicely manicured, but could've been dried a little longer. purple throughout w/ purple veins (budtender says predominantly purple w/o lower temps), dense nug, not lanky but not short and stout either.  pleasant aroma that of a high school purp.”

“Smoked some about an hour ago. 

I’m trying to goto bed and I’m litty giddy 

Dry mouth

Pretty much Woke af and ready to party yet at the same time the party would consist of being In da couch smoking and eating hella Spicy Nacho Doritos and Flaming hot Cheetos. 

I like spicy snacks. It’s like killing two birds with 1 stone. 

Reason to Drink Water

dry Mouth

Spicy Mouth

Cold iced water feels amazing to drink whi...”

“I'm so chill it's crazy. I love its taste and high. Even though I made it through teaching while high from this strain, I believe I should reserve it for the evening because I feel like I'm slowly winding down.
I'm savoring every flower I have of Purple Gorilla!!!!”
“the flavor is sweet yet rich and gives you a warm buzz.”
“Pretty good head high for about 30 minutes then an amazing full body high.”

“I'm so chill it's crazy. I love its taste and high. Even though I made it through teaching while high from this strain, I believe I should reserve it for the evening because I feel like I'm slowly winding down.
I'm savoring every flower I have of Purple Gorilla!!!!”

“Hybrid, but more sativa i'd say; 30/70. interesting sativa dominant pheno from Revolution.  Nicely manicured, but could've been dried a little longer. purple throughout w/ purple veins (budtender says predominantly purple w/o lower temps), dense nug, not lanky but not short and stout either.  pleasant aroma that of a high school purp.”

“Nabbed a few g's of some Purple Gorilla snap shatter from Altitude Extracts. I couldn't get my favorite (Gorilla Glue #4) and I don't regret it! Super tasty and really easy on the lungs and throat. Definitely an evening or after work strain; I sank blissfully into my favorite chair after trying it for the first time after a back-breaking day at work. It provides a very relaxed feeling, gives me a small case of the gi...”

“Smoked some about an hour ago. 

I’m trying to goto bed and I’m litty giddy 

Dry mouth

Pretty much Woke af and ready to party yet at the same time the party would consist of being In da couch smoking and eating hella Spicy Nacho Doritos and Flaming hot Cheetos. 

I like spicy snacks. It’s like killing two birds with 1 stone. 

Reason to Drink Water

dry Mouth

Spicy Mouth

Cold iced water feels amazing to drink whi...”
“I like the flavor and density. Smells great in a bag or jar! Pretty Dank!”

“This strain reminds of a great looking person you meet on the net.  You take the person to dinner and although you are physically aroused, when you delayer the onion so to speak, it's nothing you want to keep around.”
“Fruity, mellow great for relaxation. Great smoke”

“I love all Purple strains period. They smell and taste amazing but gets you right together quick. This strain eased me into a sleep like I never had before. I wasn't drowsy per se but I knew I was going down for the count. Such relaxation in the body!!!! I only take a few tokes at night to tuck me in. LOL”
“Love it. Hits nicely and puts me right to sleep.”
“Nice sticky buds.  Great smoke with good pain relief.”
“very tasty and a nice sweet flavor of grape mix it up with some LA cheese and you will notice a boost in energy”
“One of my favorite indicas. Promotes rest and relaxation. Has a sort of Citrus/Berry smell. Very sweet and earthy smoke.”
“Fruity, mellow great for relaxation. Great smoke”

“I love all Purple strains period. They smell and taste amazing but gets you right together quick. This strain eased me into a sleep like I never had before. I wasn't drowsy per se but I knew I was going down for the count. Such relaxation in the body!!!! I only take a few tokes at night to tuck me in. LOL”
“Great Strain dude makes me Very Excited about Everything with ah Major Chill Relaxation at the End”

“I got some of this in concentrate form from a local delivery service and i loved it. I was couch locked and happy as a clam, watched a ton of cartoons... nice taste  loved it

Get the munchies ready”
“Tried this bud for the first time 6 months ago, and I am hooked.  My favorite strain for sure!”
“Love it. Hits nicely and puts me right to sleep.”

“amazing. i was instantly feeling euphoric. i felt the pain melt away. the swelling in my head stopped too. i had an odd craving for sea food. stopped my nauseas. lasted 3 hours for me ( took 2 bowls.) im glad i have 7gs left of this stuff”
“Fruity, mellow great for relaxation. Great smoke”
“Daaaaaaank....i like the sativas...but this indica is nioooooooce”
“Was a very relaxing strain,  loved the cloud effect it gave me”

“Fast acting high. Very uplifting and made me feel very giggly. Great for trying to get some household stuff done! Great strain. However, could give a headache if you're too active from what I've experienced.”
“My expectations were high for this one, but I was underwhelmed. It was decent, but nothing special. Just made me tired and hungry, and the stone was a little too 'stupid'.”
“My expectations were high for this one, but I was underwhelmed. It was decent, but nothing special. Just made me tired and hungry, and the stone was a little too 'stupid'.”
“Short, intense head high.”
“Dense buds, thick as a can of beer. Easy to grow. Early harvest. Powdery mildew resistant. Trimmers delight.”
“RRRRRRRUH... straight 🔥....smoked out of a empire paper...smell great ...buzz...very hi.... munchie rating...hi....rating..4.5”
“ne of the best!”

“Powerful cerebral and body high. Definitely feels like an indica to me. Big time munchies, nice lifting buzz, and a nap will surely follow. Awesome stuff, but I recommend avoiding using this strain in the morning”
“Good bud - smells like sweet grapes and has a citrus earthy aftertone upon exhale..was hungry asf after hitting a few off the bong.”
“Makes not being able to function fun. I'm seriously about to pass out, but an hour ago I was dancing in my living room. Strange. *conk*”
“it's unbelievable how accurate this article is, word by word the strain had the same effects on me every time I smoke it.”

“well i must say it looks good and at first it didnt give off that much of a smell it gets better breaking it up tho. my choice was a backwood and i used flower in that damed backwood and  let me get to it.
 
well i am going to skip right into it and do this one whilst im smoking so it starts off low key i sure hope it isnt a creeper or do i? the flavor isnt that strong and you can tell it is still developing two pull...”
“Good bud - smells like sweet grapes and has a citrus earthy aftertone upon exhale..was hungry asf after hitting a few off the bong.”

“Powerful cerebral and body high. Definitely feels like an indica to me. Big time munchies, nice lifting buzz, and a nap will surely follow. Awesome stuff, but I recommend avoiding using this strain in the morning”
“Dense buds, thick as a can of beer. Easy to grow. Early harvest. Powdery mildew resistant. Trimmers delight.”
“killer crop,not the eaist to clone but pretty easy and fast to grow,nice big almost black buds outdoor,another month half for indoor tell u after crop how good it was”
“This strain is to good to pass up highly recommend for pain and having a super lazy day”
“The nugs are nice and dense.”
“really good.”
“Strong head high. It makes me feel sleepy. You can tell this strain has high indica roots. I love it though. The buds are big and beautiful and have a purple color to them.”
“killer tofu”
“Great for pain relief and relaxing.”
“ne of the best!”
“Makes not being able to function fun. I'm seriously about to pass out, but an hour ago I was dancing in my living room. Strange. *conk*”

“This stuff was bananas! It tasted similar to the grape gobstoppers you get that end up with green on the inside when you bite down. Tart but earthy and grapevine like. Strong but not overpowering, great hybrid.”

“Smells of Glue and brings a sweet aroma 
Features Dark Purple Buds all throughout with a heavy coat of trichomes and pistils 
Basic 2 Stage Hybrid effect starting off with Steady clear head buzz that moves into a Strong Indica state of Euphoria and relaxation. Great For Insomnia and Fatigue along with stress”

“Terrific strain! Deep purple flowers with a skunky/earthy aroma. Taste is out of this world, very purple-licious grapey/cherry flavor - possibly the best tasting strain I've ever tried. At ~18% thc this isn't the most potent strain but the buzz is quality - deeply relaxing warm indica body traits with a mellow euphoric head high. For me, not couch-locking strain, and maybe not the best for going straight to sleep. I'...”
“Really good”
“My current Fav!  09/09/13  Nice and mellow.  Great taste.  Smooth smoke.”
“Tried wax from this strain and it was awesome, haven't got that high in awhile. I definitely recommend it”
“gotta have it”
“Best indica”
“Got this in crumble form. It was a strong indica for me.”

“I love this strain. I smoke regularly and feel like I have a somewhat high tolerance when I smoke. The Purple Gorilla hits fast but sits around like a soft comfy head-rest type feeling. It may not last like others but you can smoke it all night without it taking over. You can still function and cope with your tasks.”

“In my experience, this bud is darker with purple undertones. A very nice deep relaxation effect being as it is indica dominate. The smell is sweet-earthy with a pungent like grape aroma. Also seems to be a very smooth smoker as well which surprised me. All around a very friendly bud to try!”
“this strain has a lovely purple kick to it.”
“so purple!!!!all you see is purple hairs. love it!!”
“not bad but not very strong high, has a lot of stems, gives headache when coming down”
“Bomb”
“This is bomb af .. Strait gas taste ! Feeling that gorilla chillin... Sticky icky..”

“This is a fun strain to smoke!! It smells like a dark purple fruity flower and taste like grape/cherry!! After a few hits I spaced out and then realized I was super high, and my aches and pains were fading fast!!
I highly recommend to ALL MANKIND! <3”
“I tried it for the first time 3 weeks ago and it was amazing”
“absolutely love it.  tastes like grapes and very mello”
“Great high out of my bong.Like a lot of indica's it makes your head feel heavy after the 1st hit then a nice sleepy body high.”
“NICE BIG NUGS. Very tasty purple. The body high IS AMAZING. NO PAIN in my biceps after a good workout I did the day before. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED to those with pain.”
“Super Good!!!! This was the best strain I have had in some time. I really enjoyed it's earthy yet sweet tones.”

“The 7-8 week flowering time is bs I just cut mine down about 30 min ago at 11 weeks and still could have went a little longer but the results are amazing the plant couldn't even hold it self up in the end and super frosty!”

“I like this strain a lot, it's quite a nice body high coupled with a constant euphoria that is unique to most indica. I was worried that I was buying two ounces of something I have never heard of before but once I broke into it I knew it was excellent quality and I'm very satisfied with my purchase!”

“If you love gorilla glue #4 then you'll go crazy over this strain. I believe it is Glue #4 crossed with either Urkle or GDP. Love the after effects, very indica dominate for sure. Mad love to the Bay Area for this lovely flower.”
“Great high!”
“Very smooth sailing. Very happy with it.”
“good shit”
“nice big and fluffy nugs. very very purple!”
“Very very nice , one of a kind”

“no green in the buds whatsoever, completely dark purple and frosty. tastes real grapey. I got lazy after blazing, so I would recommend night time use. this stuff is fantastic, I hope I come across it again soon.”
“l Love This KillA”

“This strain is awesome! I got an eight today for $25 and I have only smoked 2 grams and its in full effect. 
This strain is gonna put you to sleep. I wouldn't recommend this strain if you are trying to be productive.  ;)”
“Smooth smoke, slight berry like taste. Quickly lowered my eyelids and tingles through my extremities. Great night time smoke! Will buy again.”
“Headaches when coming down.. for that reason... 3 star Claude Debussy”

“wow, much more intense then I expected from this hybrid.  comes on fast to the head, then an all over body buzz.  smooth and a bit sweet in the bong.  VERY relaxing and it will put you to sleep.  great all around”
“buyer's remorse on this medication.  It was pushed by the budtender, and with purple nuggets and a fresh smell seemed like a good one.  It wasn't”

“I love purple buds and this
 one actually has a grape flavor!”
“Garbage....don't waste your time on this strain.”
“I got this as a oil...not that great...weak”
“Benign.The primo.  Strong and  good flavor.  Pretty”
“I got more of an earthy taste hints of berries..couchlock was decent good for like watching a movie..the headache while coming down killed it for me tho..”

“they brought me an eighth of supposably Gorilla Glue shatter before I could even look at it because it was night time I got in my house turn the light on and noticed it was packaged horribly and late into the plastic bag they refuse to return my money horrible service”
“They sold me in eighth of some crap that leads into the plastic bag before it even got to me refused to come back and give me my money back I give this place a fucking zero fuck you”
“this one is a bit weak. not great effects. i wouldn't get it again”
